item.title: Groups sue EPA over canceled $7 billion solar program for low-income Americans
item.description: Several groups filed a lawsuit against the EPA over the canceling of a program intended to make solar power accessible to lower-income Americans.

item.title: Trump admin freezes $2.1 billion for Chicago projects, blames Democrats for shutdown holdup
item.description: The move came on the third day of the federal government shutdown, which President Donald Trump has blamed on Democrats in Congress.
